column5: This course focuses on how the body defends itself against disease. Immunology helps us understand processes of viral, bacterial or parasitic infection and how the immune system is sometimes tricked into attacking its own tissue, leading to diseases like rheumatoid arthritis, diabetes or allergy.It will provide you with comprehensive postgraduate life sciences training including a broad range of practical laboratory skills.
